basic.description: This course is a continuation of general chemistry for honors students. Topics include solution equilibria; acid/base chemistry; oxidation, reduction, and electrochemical cells; chemical analysis; hydrides and oxides of the elements; kinetics; advanced bonding and structure.
basic.subject: CHM
basic.title: Honors General Chemistry II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CHM 1050 and 1050L, each with a grade of "C-" or better, or CHM 1045 and 1045L, each with a grade of "C-" or better and instructor permission. Corequisite: CHM1051L.
